ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] RE: Stun and the Mes line...
ygData.msgSnippet: MoB is an old acronym for Mobile Offensive something or other I think. Yes your pet will continue to attack and break Mez. Lull is designed for pulls but the
ygData.messageBody:
MoB is an old acronym for Mobile Offensive something or other I think.
Yes your pet will continue to attack and break Mez.
Lull is designed for pulls but the longer lasting versions lower a monsters yell for help radius so can keep them from bringing others once the battle has begun.
However they must be cast before combat and don't last very long so best use is to help break a camp.
Stonedreamer


Stallion02@...

03/02/00 06:07 PM
Please respond to eqenchanters

       
        To:        eqenchanters@onelist.com
        cc:        
        Subject:        Re: [eqenchanters] RE: Stun and the Mes line...


From: Stallion02@...

As a relatively newbie enchanter I have some spell questions, sorry if they
seem stupid:

If your pet is attacking while you cast mes will it continue to attack and
break mes or will it stop?

Does lull have any use during battle? Or is it just good for an initial pull
from a camp?

I know an MoB is a monster, but what does MoB stand for?


                                   Thanks For your patience,
                                   Bactroban
